title: Screen froze mid game. Had to force power off my computer
body: I had this on the PBE and now on the live server. The game will just freeze and I won't be able to alt tab off to another screen or exit the game. I feel pretty bad about it here because I was playing PVP and when I came back we lost. Any help to prevent this from happening again would be appreciated!

replies.body: i think this is happening because of a windows update, people are mentioning it in another posts, don't think rito has even acknowledged it.
how to fix????????

I had this exact issue as well. If any Rioter wants more information, please feel free to reach out to me. I am a system administrator, so I am pretty technically savvy and can help facilitate this if needed.

Edit: I reinstalled the game last night, this evening I will be testing out if that fixes the issue.

i've played league 10 years, this has never happened to me once until this day, it has happened a total of 4 times out of 5 games. I can log off windows and relog and restart league to "correct" to issue, but that's it. The game is Frozen, but i can still hear the sounds going on. I can't ctrl alt del and end league as an individual process.. i have to log off.

the copy and paste answers typical riot
I mean, it's a bunch of posts from various people with the same problem, from whom I need the same information. Why would I write something different each time?
Because everybody else is held to a different standard where copy pasted posts are removed and deemed "low effort" even if you're replying to the same type of issue.
Hmmm, that's fair. I shouldn't get special treatment just because I have a Riot tag. I can get on board with that. I'll try to copy-pasta less :-)

hold on a second, don't take that guff! aren't you just troubleshooting?

or am i missing a joke
if you need information you shouldn't need to post less efficiently just to tick a "it's not copy-pasted" box.
There's always room for improvement!

maybe you should it seems like your a bot and you also claimed  (we turned it off when we saw your report) but then you start it back up so more people have problems? 
but i will give you credit for actually talking to the community unlike the other rioters

Heyo! Sorry for the late response - I didn't realize I've been logged in on my PBE boards account, so I didn't notice this message :(

It's definitely off. This wouldn't have anything to do with your network connection. If you were having an issue due to this feature, your screen would freeze entirely.

Without seeing the error, I can't really guess what might be wrong.

This happened to two of my teammates in my ranked game, felt pretty bad.

This happened to me in two of the last three games I played. Very frustrating.  Voice chat stayed connected and computer didn't freeze as I could move mouse around and restart with ctrl alt del, but the game itself froze and failed to show anything and wouldn't let me exit in any way or even minimize to let me use task manager. It did not have anything to do with Internet connection as my ping was good both times when it happened and I could check my Internet through the command page and I was still connected. 
After the first event, I did a full repair of league and tried using hex tech repair tool as well. Idk what else to try as clearly neither worked
Quite a game breaking bug as I'd really like to not get banned for afking when the game does this. Hope the information helps and best of luck in fixing this!

Edit:added more info
